sentences.en: Confucius and Plato realized the connexion of the music and the human beings.
sentences.cn: 孔子与柏拉图二人都认识到音乐与人类有紧密联系,音乐对人类有重要的作用和价值.

sentences.en: Connexion's service is expected to debut soon on Lufthansa flights from Frankfurt to Washington.
sentences.cn: 康奈新的服务将很快在汉莎航空公司由法兰克福至华盛顿的航线上启动.

sentences.en: Frequently consider the connexion of all things in the universe and their relation to one another.
sentences.cn: 经常考虑宇宙中所有事物的联系和它们的相互关系.

sentences.en: Syntactics is a subject to study abstract formal connexion among the signs.
sentences.cn: 符号学是研究符号之间的抽象形式联系的学科.

sentences.en: The connexion is not a simple derivation.
sentences.cn: 这种连接并不只是衍生性的。

sentences.en: There was a direct intimate connexion between chastity and political orthodoxy.
sentences.cn: 纯洁身心跟政治正统,真有种直接又紧密的联系.

trans.tran_cn: 关系，连接，人脉，接头，联运，亲戚
